meanings.definition: An examination of a body after death.
meanings.sent1: The scientists conducted necropsies on the deceased animals to learn more about their health.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian performed necropsies on the farm animals to determine the cause of death.
meanings.sent3: During the necropsies, the researchers discovered unexpected findings that puzzled them.
meanings.sent4: The necropsies revealed secrets hidden within the bodies of the deceased.
meanings.sent5: The detailed necropsies provided valuable insights into the animals' well-being.

meanings.definition: The act of performing an autopsy on an animal.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper conducted necropsies on the exotic animals to understand their health conditions.
meanings.sent2: The wildlife biologist specialized in performing necropsies on various species to study their anatomy.
meanings.sent3: The necropsies on the zoo animals turned into a fascinating learning experience for the students.
meanings.sent4: Through necropsies, the veterinarians could unravel the mysteries surrounding the animals' deaths.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous necropsies provided crucial information for the conservation efforts.
